TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExplorerNodeTypeProvider

summary.span: 提供“服务器资源管理器”的“SharePoint 连接”节点层次结构中新类型节点的定义。

span.span: Provides the definition of a new type of node in the **SharePoint Connections** hierarchy of nodes in **Server Explorer**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此接口可创建新类型的节点。Implement this interface to create a new type of node. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：将自定义 SharePoint 节点添加到](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer)服务器资源管理器。For more information, see [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer). 实现此接口的类必须包括 和要由 Visual Studio 发现的。Classes that implement this interface must include the and the to be discovered by Visual Studio. ## Examples |日期Date|历史记录History|原因Reason| |----------|-------------|------------| |[!INCLUDE[dev10_cpub1](~/includes/dev10-cpub1-md.md)]|添加了新的备注, 其中包含指向演示如何实现此接口的主题的链接Added new remarks with links to topics that show how to implement this interface|[!INCLUDE[enhancement](~/includes/enhancement-md.md)]|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeType(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeDefinition typeDefinition) cil managed

span.span: The definition of the new node type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以处理事件并设置`typeDefinition`参数的属性以定义节点的行为。You can handle events and set properties of the `typeDefinition` parameter to define the behavior of the node. 例如, 可以指定节点的图标或文本, 并可以处理以下事件:For example, you can specify the icon or text for the node, and you can handle the following events: - ：处理此事件可向节点添加新的子节点。: Handle this event to add new child nodes to the node. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：将自定义 SharePoint 节点添加到](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer)服务器资源管理器。For more information, see [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer). - ：处理此事件可向节点添加自定义快捷菜单项。: Handle this event to add a custom shortcut menu item to the node. - ：处理此事件可向节点添加自定义属性。: Handle this event to add custom properties to the node. 选择节点时, 属性将显示在 "**属性**" 窗口中。The properties appear in the **Properties** window when the node is selected. 为每个实现调用一次此方法。This method is called once for each implementation.
